INDIVIDUAL MONZO ACCOUNT BENEFITS
 
AWARD-WINNING SUPPORT: Get real support from real people, fast. Our award-winning team is here to help you get the most out of Monzo!
 
ALL YOUR FINANCES AT YOUR FINGERTIPS: Manage multiple bank accounts in one place. Link all your checking, savings, joint accounts, as well as credit cards from other providers, and see them in one easy view.
 
SAVE: Save with specific goals in mind by dividing your salary and other incoming payments across different Pots. Round up payments and put spare change in a Pot instantly.
 
SPEND: Get on top of your spending with instant notifications every time you pay for something, with a balance that updates immediately, not days later.
 
EASY BUDGETING: Set budgets for things like groceries, or going out. Monzo automatically categorizes your spending so it’s easy to track.

SAY GOODBYE TO FEES: We don’t charge fees for spending on your card, we don’t charge overdraft fees and we don’t mark up the exchange rate when you go abroad.
 
SEND AND RECEIVE MONEY WITH NO TRANSFER FEES: Pay and get paid in seconds for free, and start spending your money instantly.

STAY IN CONTROL: If you lose your card, freeze it in the app and get a new one quickly. (Or defrost it if you find it again.)
 
TRAVEL WORRY-FREE: Use your card anywhere
 
Whether it's with your hot coral debit card, or Apple Pay, Monzo works all around the world, and you don’t need to tell us when you're going.

REST EASY: Money in your Monzo account is protected by FDIC, so you’re insured up to $250,000, and our anti-fraud systems make sure your money is safe, without adding friction for you.
